captions.text: You want me to put the hammer down?!

Why didn't you run away while we settled out
differences?

Ok, we're not taking him back to base, he
is definitely up to something.
I dare you, I double dare you!
Puny god, puny god, puny god!!
Hey, you guys ever had shawarma?
Yea.. You've never had shawarma either?
Um, why do I have to sit in Hulk's lap?

Hey.. Im Batman.
You wanna know my secret identity?
So, you guys had quite a weekend.

First you guys were all against each other
then you're buddy got killed so you're suddenly friends..

Uh, yea. Um, you kinda missed out on that
part.

But luckily, you still wanted to be friends
later.

Yea right after you fell from the sky and
conveniently learned to control your rage.
And did you steal a motorcycle?

Details like Odin being able to send Thor
back to earth?

Or the professor conveniently making a way
to close the portal?
That worked out well for you guys.

Or the Chitauri all dying Phantom Menace style
after the nuke?!
Yup, one convenient thing after another.
Hmm.. Kind of like your utility bill.

You know what I think? I think you two are
just jealous that we knocked it out of the park.

I guess I would be jealous, if I wasn't like
all of you combined. If I couldn't fly..

or shoot lasers or catch missiles or see really
far or smash through buildings..
Ohhh... We've broken too many records!

We can't hear you through all of this box
office moneyyyy!!
Natasha, do I have a mark on my face?

Right here.. Not here or here so much, but
right here.
Hey guys, time to suit up.
OH MY GOSH! What happened to your face??
Hey thanks for watching, we hope you enjoyed it.

Leave us a comment or watch some more super
heroes. Like me.

And speaking of like, if you want more How
It Should Have Ended updates, go like our Facebook page.

Ok, guys come on. When do I get to come in
the cafe?
Dude, nobody ever said you can't come in here.
Yea this is a public place.

Ive been hanging around out here for like
two years!

comments.author: s247485

comments.text:
I feel like Marvel has slowly become more and more immature to appeal to a 
younger audience, whereas DC has gradually begun to move from it's 
lighthearted, friendly, origins and started to take itself more seriously. 
I mean, I loved the Captain America movies, but I feel like most Marvel 
movies are so stupidly thrown together to make a buck it's insulting. They 
feel rushed and lack in character development. Marvel has a few cool heroes 
like Cap and the Hulk, but I've always felt like they rip off of DC. 
Examples: Quicksilver is just a slower Flash, and Hawkeye is a rip off of 
Green Arrow. The X-Men were kinda neat, but to simply blame everyone's 
powers on "mutations" feels kinda lazy. I wish Marvel would put together 
something more....paced like DC does, and DC would try being a little less 
dark all the time.﻿

comments.text:
As a Marvel AND DC fan I'd say maybe if DC utilized its hundreds of 
characters and stopped relying on Batman and Superman to bring in the money 
they would do better. Marvel took GoTG ,something hardly anyone knew about, 
and made it a hit. Let me repeat that, a movie including a tree and a 
talking raccoon made bank. DC could do amazing and things if they just 
thought out of the box.

Like make a movie about the Batfam instead of just Batman. Bring in Wonder 
Woman. Make a Green Lantern movie that's actually good. Just shake things 
up a little bit.

﻿
